summary: Part of the Bronze Set      (Took 180 minutes to get this perfectly aligned) Man I hate texturing maces! lol
descriptionHtml:
Hey guys,

You can find the Bronze Mace in the Steel Smithing Category.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

REQUIREMENTS:
* Steel Smithing /
* Corundum Ore /
* Leather Strips /
* Steel Ingot /
* Ale (Cos everyone needs a drink after a hard day\'s blacksmithing + It\'s part of the Bronze Set

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FEATURES: (Comparison: Vanilla Steel Mace Stats)
* Weight: 1lb more
* Attack: is 20% stronger
* Crit: 0% better
* Speed: 4% faster
author: Elgar2389
